lpspline.penalties.smooth module

class lpspline.penalties.smooth.Lasso(alpha: float = 1.0)[source]

Bases: Penalty

property alpha: float
build_penalty(s: Spline) → list[source]

Creates a Lasso penalty: alpha * sum(abs(variables)). Returns a list of cvxpy expressions to be added to the objective.

class lpspline.penalties.smooth.Ridge(alpha: float = 1.0)[source]

Bases: Penalty

property alpha: float
build_penalty(s: Spline) → list[source]

Creates a Ridge penalty: alpha * sum(variables**2). Returns a list of cvxpy expressions to be added to the objective.
